fields.name: Melee Weapon I
fields.description: Basic Training of melee weapon. +25% melee weapons damage and +10% hit rate.

fields.name: Melee Weapon II
fields.description: Advanced Training of melee weapon. +50% melee weapons damage and +20% hit rate.

fields.name: Melee Weapon III
fields.description: Expert Training of melee weapon. +75% melee weapons damage and +30% hit rate.

fields.name: Melee Weapon IV
fields.description: Master Training of melee weapon. +100% melee weapons damage and +40% hit rate.

fields.name: Melee Weapon V
fields.description: Ultra Training of melee weapon. +120% melee weapons damage, +50% hit rate, and 20% chance to melee attack again immediately.
